definition: arteries and veins/network of blood vessels/vascular system (of a plant or animal)/(fig.) fabric (i.e. underlying structure, as in "social fabric")/overall context
arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)
net-like object/to hold sth in place with a net/to wind/to twist/(TCM) channels in the human body
choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)

sentences.english: The basic structure of the Ice and Fire books is familiar enough.
sentences.chinese: 《冰与火之歌》的基本脉络大家一定都很熟悉了。

sentences.english: Choroidal folds in the macular area suggest hypotony .
sentences.chinese: 黄斑区脉络膜皱褶提示张力减退。

sentences.english: When the iris is inflamed, it is likely that the ciliary body and choroid are involved too.
sentences.chinese: 当虹膜是发炎，很可能睫状体和脉络膜都参与过。

sentences.english: And discusses the various periods of pine construction development.
sentences.chinese: 并论述了各个时期松景营建的发展脉络。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To investigate into the prescription of Mailuotong and its ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 目的对脉络通整方及其单味药进行研究。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical and pathological characteristics of choroidal metastatic carcinoma from lung carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察肺癌脉络膜转移的临床及病理组织学特征。

sentences.english: Is Your Brain a File Drawer or a Web of Ideas?
sentences.chinese: 你的头脑，是一个文件柜，还是一个知识脉络？

sentences.english: Beggared of blood to blush through lively veins.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏鲜血去灌注淡红的脉络？

sentences.english: Results There were not reports of choroid osteoma denied after checking in pathology.
sentences.chinese: 结果均未见经病理检查后否认的脉络膜骨瘤的报道。

sentences.english: In the context of life takes visible.
sentences.chinese: 生命的脉络才历历可见。

sentences.english: The innovation of Chinese philosophy has its inner logic and succession sequence.
sentences.chinese: 中国哲学的创新有其内在的逻辑根据和演替脉络。

sentences.english: The first section elaborated the Western Han Dynasty time dance art development vein.
sentences.chinese: 第一节论述了西汉时期舞蹈艺术的发展脉络。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the MRI characteristics of choroid fissure cysts of the brain.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨脑部脉络膜裂囊肿的MRI表现特点。

sentences.english: Pathologically, the choroid incrassated from posterior to anterior gradually.
sentences.chinese: 病理改变以脉络膜从前向后的逐渐增厚为特征。

sentences.english: It was bright red with well-defined veins.
sentences.chinese: 它有着鲜艳的红色和清晰的脉络。

sentences.english: The special exhibition focuses on different periods and shows the history of the site itself.
sentences.chinese: 特展则是针对不同阶段，呈现古迹本体的历史脉络。

definition: to clarify (disparate material into a coherent narrative)/to marshal an argument
arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)
to proceed from the outside to the inside/to see the essence merely by looking at the superficial appearance
to be linked together/to be involved with/to collude/interconnection/involvement/collusion
to concentrate on the main points (idiom); to bring out the essentials
to analyze thoroughly, point by point (idiom)
to run through/a connecting thread from beginning to end/to link
